content:

CONSTRAINTS: You arrive at Nob Hill at 9:00AM. Mary will be at Embarcadero from 8:00PM to 9:15PM. You'd like to meet Mary for a minimum of 75 minutes. Kenneth will be at The Castro from 11:15AM to 7:15PM. You'd like to meet Kenneth for a minimum of 30 minutes. Joseph will be at Haight-Ashbury from 8:00PM to 10:00PM. You'd like to meet Joseph for a minimum of 120 minutes. Sarah will be at Union Square from 11:45AM to 2:30PM. You'd like to meet Sarah for a minimum of 90 minutes. Thomas will be at North Beach from 7:15PM to 7:45PM. You'd like to meet Thomas for a minimum of 15 minutes. Daniel will be at Pacific Heights from 1:45PM to 8:30PM. You'd like to meet Daniel for a minimum of 15 minutes. Richard will be at Chinatown from 8:00AM to 6:45PM. You'd like to meet Richard for a minimum of 30 minutes. Mark will be at Golden Gate Park from 5:30PM to 9:30PM. You'd like to meet Mark for a minimum of 120 minutes. David will be at Marina District from 8:00PM to 9:00PM. You'd like to meet David for a minimum of 60 minutes. Karen will be at Russian Hill from 1:15PM to 6:30PM. You'd like to meet Karen for a minimum of 120 minutes.

Your response should start with 'SOLUTION:'.

Please output the meeting schedule in the following JSON format:
{"itinerary": [{"action": "meet", "person": "<PERSON_NAME>", "start_time": "<HH:MM>", "end_time": "<HH:MM>"}]}. Make sure to include the person's name for each meeting.

SOLUTION:

To solve this problem, we need to consider the constraints and the travel distances between locations. We will use a greedy approach to optimize the meeting schedule.

1. Meet Richard at Chinatown (9:00 AM - 9:30 AM)
Travel from Nob Hill to Chinatown: 9 minutes
Minimum meeting time: 30 minutes

2. Meet Sarah at Union Square (11:45 AM - 1:15 PM)
Travel from Chinatown to Union Square: 7 minutes
Travel from Union Square to Nob Hill: 9 minutes (returning to Nob Hill)
Minimum meeting time: 90 minutes

3. Meet Daniel at Pacific Heights (1:45 PM - 2:15 PM)
Travel from Nob Hill to Pacific Heights: 8 minutes
Travel from Pacific Heights to Nob Hill: 8 minutes (returning to Nob Hill)
Minimum meeting time: 15 minutes

4. Meet Kenneth at The Castro (2:15 PM - 3:15 PM)
Travel from Nob Hill to The Castro: 17 minutes
Minimum meeting time: 30 minutes

5. Meet Karen at Russian Hill (3:15 PM - 5:15 PM)
Travel from The Castro to Russian Hill: 18 minutes
Travel from Russian Hill to Nob Hill: 5 minutes (returning to Nob Hill)
Travel from Nob Hill to Russian Hill: 5 minutes (returning to Russian Hill)
Minimum meeting time: 120 minutes

6. Travel to Golden Gate Park (5:15 PM - 5:30 PM)
Travel from Russian Hill to Golden Gate Park: 19 minutes

7. Meet Mark at Golden Gate Park (5:30 PM - 7:30 PM)
Minimum meeting time: 120 minutes

8. Travel to Embarcadero (7:30 PM - 7:45 PM)
Travel from Golden Gate Park to Embarcadero: 25 minutes

9. Meet Mary at Embarcadero (7:45 PM - 9:00 PM)
Minimum meeting time: 75 minutes

10. Travel to Marina District (9:00 PM - 9:15 PM)
Travel from Embarcadero to Marina District: 14 minutes

11. Meet David at Marina District (9:15 PM - 10:15 PM)
Minimum meeting time: 60 minutes

12. Travel to Haight-Ashbury (10:15 PM - 10:30 PM)
Travel from Marina District to Haight-Ashbury: 16 minutes

13. Meet Joseph at Haight-Ashbury (10:30 PM - 12:30 AM)
Minimum meeting time: 120 minutes
